item.title: Video game performers go on strike over artificial intelligence - BBC.com
item.description:
1. Video game performers go on strike over artificial intelligence  BBC.com
  2. SAG-AFTRA Calls Strike Against Major Video Game Companies After Nearly 2 Years Of Contract Talks  Deadline
  3. EA CEO Says Video Game Actor Strikes Won't Have 'Short-Term Impact' on the Company  IGN
  4. SAG-AFTRA performers to hold first strike picket outside WB Games  Game Developer
  5. EA's CEO Isn't Worried About Immediate Impact From Video Game Actors' Strike  GameSpot
